meanings: [Noun] (colloquial) A short, a short seller: one who engages in short selling.

vlive.korean: 월화수목금퇼 - 여러분들은 뭐 하셨나요? Saturday and Sunday feel shorter. - What did you do? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : First UNLOCK in Chicago❤
vlive.english: Saturday and Sunday feel shorter. - What did you do?

머리가 짧아졌죠? My hair got shorter, right? 듣기 View video NCT : 툥이에요💚
빠른 거 맞네요 - 더 했어야 하는 건데 그렇죠? So of course it felt shorter. - We should have had one more week, right? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 눈 뜨고 일어나보니 막방😭
vlive.english: So of course it felt shorter. - We should have had one more week, right?

vlive.korean: 그 미터기 딱 갔을 때 - 넌 그럼 갑자기 줄어들어 밤에는? When I stand on the height measuring tool... - You become shorter at night? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [LOVELYZ][OH MY GIRL] 물만두X군만두 요정들 깜찍함에 구르다 터진 왕만두 된 나,,🥟 (MIJOO&HYOJUNG talking about contents)
vlive.english: When I stand on the height measuring tool... - You become shorter at night?

examples.korean: Shorter hemlines are back in this season. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이번 시즌에는 짧은 길이[치마]가 다시 유행이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Shorter hemlines are back in this season. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She’d look better with shorter hair. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 머리를 더 짧게 하면 더 보기 좋을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She’d look better with shorter hair. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She is a full four inches shorter than her sister. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 언니[여동생]보다 키가 무려 4인치나 작다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She is a full four inches shorter than her sister. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The male is generally larger with a shorter beak. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 수컷이 대체로 부리는 더 짧고 몸집은 더 크다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The male is generally larger with a shorter beak. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The firm is introducing a shorter working week. 듣기 Add to Wordbook (그) 회사에서는 더 짧은 주당 근무 시간을 도입하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The firm is introducing a shorter working week. Add to Wordbook
